mapper.update: update tbl_activity set owner=#{owner}, name=#{name}, startDate=#{startDate}, endDate=#{endDate}, cost=#{cost}, description=#{description}, editTime = #{editTime}, editBy= #{editBy} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete:
delete from tbl_activity where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select id, owner, name, startDate, endDate, cost, description, createTime, createBy, editTime, editBy from tbl_activity where id = #{id}

select a.id, u.name as owner, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, a.cost, a.description, a.createTime, a.createBy, a.editTime, a.editBy from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on a.owner = u.id where a.id = #{id}

select car.id, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, u.name as owner from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on a.owner = u.id join tbl_clue_activity_relation car on a.id = car.activityId where car.clueId = #{id}

select a.id, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, u.name as owner from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on a.owner = u.id where a.name like '%' #{name} '%' and a.id not in ( select car.activityId from tbl_clue_activity_relation car where car.clueId = #{clueId} )
